name: Gates of Troy
description:
Gates of Troy is an empire building Turn Based Strategy game. It is a stand-alone expansion for Spartan. When the games are combined all the missions from Spartan can be played with the upgraded engine from Gates of Troy. The game comes with 6 campaigns including an accurate recreation of the Battle of Thermopylae. 19 new heroes from Greek mythology can be commanded to improve your armies.

Like its predecessor Spartan, trade, construction, research and diplomacy play a large role, but war remains a last resort. New structures that can be build include the Trojan Horse.
